activities: When we facilitate marketing research studies, we often receive names, phone numbers, email addresses,and sometimes physical addresses of participants. When parties dial into a conference call, their phone numbers are recorded in our data base. We actually receive a relatively small amount of data, as the qualitative research studies we support typically include a range of approximately ten to fifty people.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: Combination of Self-Assessment and Outside Complia
personaldata: PII including names, phone numbers, email addresses and on occasion physical addresses.
privacyprograms: ESOMAR; Mobile Marketing Research Association, MRA
recoursemech: Civicom is committed to protecting the PII provided to us through our established security policies and continuously upgraded procedures for handling data. We would immediately endeavor to resolve any concern raised by a individual. If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using eTrust Privacy Services as a third party resolution provider. You can reach eTrust's privacy complaint system at the following URL: http://www.etrust.org/complaint/raise_privacy_complaint.php”
